text: Lirapex is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Peltospiridae. ==Species== Species within the genus Lirapex include: * Lirapex costellata Warén & Bouchet, 2001 * Lirapex granularis Warén & Bouchet, 1989 * Lirapex humata Warén & Bouchet, 2001 * Lirapex politus Chen, Zhou, Wang & Copley, 2017 ==References== Category:Peltospiridae
title: Lirapex
